data.text: You come across a pair of smooth metal doors and faintly glowing buttons: an elevator. A time-faded sign barely legible in the dim light reads "SURFACE: Emergency".
Ascending via the elevator confirms it leads into a partially-destroyed building near the village plaza. You have to dislodge a few boards to free up the entrance, but it doesn't take too long.
It's good to know where this entrance is. You should be able to get back here from above now.
